content.data:
[W]Navigation and service notes.
[c][m.]
[W]Use number keys on menu and section
[W]index frames to jump by page number.
[W]0 always returns to the main index
[W]page, and # goes to this help page
[W]where routing tables apply.
[W]Article frames are designed for simple
[W]reading with safe Telstar markup and
[W]CRLF line endings.
[c][m-]
[Y]Credits
[G]- AMSHOLE is a fictional CPC fan
[G]magazine service.
[G]- Technical notes are remixed from
[G]local repository documents including
[G]firmware and M4 developer material.
[G]- Public reference knowledge from
[G]classic CPC documentation, community
[Y]CONTINUED ON 199b
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
